name: MultiAd Creator Pro Document
summary: Learn about .CRTR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: To import Creator Pro documents into Adobe InDesign, you can export the CRTR file as a .PDF and then import it into InDesign with the PDF2ID plugin. However, the quality of the document may be reduced due to the conversion process.

description: Marketing document created by Creator Pro, a program used for designing business marketing materials; saves the page layout information, graphics, text, and other document data; used for printing flyers and other promotional materials.
